T04D3974:255a-1: a'a pa tti de sha na bi dhi /
T04D3974:255a-3: ltung ba bshags pa'i cho ga / sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo //
T04D3974:255a-4: bla ma rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po la sogs
T04D3974:255a-5: pa phyogs bcu na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas dang byang
T04D3974:255a-6: chub sems dpa' thams cad bdag la dgongs su gsol
T04D3974:255a-7: // btsun pa bdag la dgongs su gsol //
T04D3974:255a-8: bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi bas 'khor ba thog ma
T04D3974:255a-9: ma mchis pa nas tha ma da lta la thug
T04D3974:255a-10: gi bar du 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang gti
T04D3974:255a-11: mug gi dbang gis lus dang ngag dang yid kyi
T04D3974:255a-12: sgo nas mi dge ba bcu bgyis pa dang /
T04D3974:255a-14: de dang nye ba lnga dang /
T04D3974:255a-15: so sor thar pa'i sdom pa dang 'gal ba dang /
T04D3974:255a-16: byang chub sems dpa'i bslab pa dang 'gal ba dang /
T04D3974:255a-17: gsang sngags kyi dam tshig dang 'gal ba la sogs
T04D3974:255a-18: pa mdor na mtho ris dang thar pa'i gegs su
T04D3974:255a-19: gyur cing / 'khor ba dang ngan song gi rgyur
T04D3974:255a-20: gyur pa'i nyes ltung gi tshogs ci mchis pa de
T04D3974:255a-21: dag thams cad bla ma rdo rje 'dzin pa la
T04D3974:255a-22: sogs pa phyogs bcun bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas dang byang
T04D3974:255a-23: chub sems dpa' thams cad dang /
T04D3974:255a-24: btsun pa'i spyan sngar mtho lo bshags so //
T04D3974:255a-26: mthol zhing bshags na bdag bde ba la reg par gnas par 'gyur gyi /
T04D3974:255a-27: ma mthol ma bshags na de ltar mi 'gyur ba lags so zhes lan gsum brjod do //
T04D3974:255a-28: de nas mthong sdom dris la thabs yin no //
T04D3974:255a-30: dang por sbyor ba'i cho ga ni /
T04D3974:255a-31: bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba la 'khor ba thog
T04D3974:255b-0: ma med pa nas kyi @255b nyon mongs pa mang
T04D3974:255b-1: ba'am / bag med pa la sogs pa'i stobs kyis
T04D3974:255b-2: nyes ltung gi tshogs mang po bdog ste mchi bas
T04D3974:255b-3: ba'am / / de dag dge 'dun gyi spyan sngar
T04D3974:255b-4: bshags par 'chal bas thugs kyis gzung 'tshal zhes pa
T04D3974:255b-5: dang mjug ltung ba las bslang ba shin tu bka'
T04D3974:255b-6: drin che lags zhes pa dang /
T04D3974:255b-7: chos bzhin du mdzad pa rjes su yi rang zhes brjod par bya'o //
T04D3974:255b-8: ltung ba bshags pa'i cho ga slob dpon dpal mar me mdzad ye shes kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so /
T04D3974:255b-10: // / rgya gar gyi mkhan po de nyid dang /
